name: UIScrollView.IndicatorStyle
desc: The style of the scroll indicators. You use these constants to set the value of the indicatorStyle style.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default style of scroll indicator, which is black with a white border. This style is good against any content background.

items.name: case black
items.desc: A style of indicator which is black and smaller than the default style. This style is good against a white content background.

items.name: case white
items.desc: A style of indicator is white and smaller than the default style. This style is good against a black content background.
